details: Implemented 5 analysis types: anomaly, behavioral, pattern, threat, baseline
Advanced threat analyzer with APT attribution (APT28, APT29, Lazarus Group)
Statistical analysis methods (Z-score, IQR, time series analysis)
MITRE ATT&CK framework integration for threat detection
Comprehensive baseline management with adaptive learning
Event-driven analysis pipeline with Redis integration
Multi-format output support (PDF, HTML, JSON, CSV, Excel)
Advanced chart generation with Plotly (9+ chart types)
7 report types: security dashboard, risk assessment, incident analysis, compliance, threat intelligence, performance metrics, executive summary
Template-based report generation with customization
Automated report scheduling and distribution
Data visualization with interactive charts
SIEM integration with Splunk and Elastic Security
Cloud security integration with AWS Security Hub and GuardDuty
Threat intelligence feeds (MISP, VirusTotal, AlienVault OTX)
Vulnerability management (NVD, GitHub Advisories, Tenable)
Ticketing systems (Jira, ServiceNow) integration
Comprehensive integration lifecycle management
Health monitoring and failover capabilities
Comprehensive plugin metadata management with reviews and ratings
Advanced search and discovery with filtering and recommendations
Plugin installation system with dependency resolution
Virtual environment management for plugin isolation
Community features with collections and curation
Analytics and trending analysis
Complete REST API with marketplace operations
